name: Selle Italia Sport Gel Flow Saddle - Unisex
description: For long commutes or cross-country rides, this saddle is made for comfort. The width and anatomical cutout allows you to focus on your rides instead of your bum. Gel inserts cushion the bumps, drops and long miles at the end of the day.Durable Duro-Tek cover.Rails are made of alloy for lightweight strength.Silicone gel inserts soak up bumps and rattles.Central cut-out provides pressure relief.
